text: avane (allahane) tanna anugrahakke (malege) munna, subhavarteyagi galiyannu kaluhisuvavanu. Konege avu (nirinda) bharavada modagalannu hottu tandaga navu avugalannu nirjiva nadinedege oyyutteve mattu avugalinda nirannu surisutteve hagu adara mulaka navu ella bageya phalagalannu horatarutteve â€“ ide riti navu mrtarannu (jivanta) hora taraliddeve â€“ nivu patha kaliyabekendu (idannu helalaguttide)
